overview.basic:
Ticket to Ride: Europe takes you on a train adventure across Europe. From Edinburgh to Constantinople and from Lisbon to Moscow, you'll visit great cities of turn-of-the-century Europe.
Collect and play train cards to link cities and finish your tickets — completed tickets are worth bonus points, but incomplete tickets lose you points! Outsmart your rivals, and build a grand rail network to become the most influential rail magnate in Europe.
